sentences.english: The Dragon Dance performed by retired women teachers and workers.
sentences.chinese: 由退休教師和工人組成的女子舞龍隊。

sentences.english: We go out to see a lion and and set off some fireworks.
sentences.chinese: 我們出去看看舞龍獅和放鞭炮。

sentences.english: Young men would highlight the parade with a dragon dance.
sentences.chinese: 年輕人會強調燈展和舞龍一起舉行。

sentences.english: Dragon dance is a form of traditional dance and performance in Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 舞龍是一種中國文化的傳統舞蹈和表演。

sentences.english: Today is the Lantern Festival, why not go to wach the Dragon Dances with us?
sentences.chinese: 今天是燈節，爲什麼不跟我們去看舞龍呢？

sentences.english: They are learning a dragon dance with my grandpa.
sentences.chinese: 他們正在跟我祖父學習舞龍。

sentences.english: Folk dragon dance has been part of the dragon culture in China for quite a long history.
sentences.chinese: 民俗舞龍作爲龍文化下的具象之一，源遠流長。

sentences.english: My brother is learning dragon dance.
Dragon dance is traditional folk sports activities in China.
sentences.chinese: 舞龍活動是中國的民間傳統體育活動。

sentences.english: Lion dance and dragon dance are traditional performances of the Spring Festival.
sentences.chinese: 舞獅舞龍是春節的傳統表演。

sentences.english: Stilt-walking, drumming and dragon and lion dancing are the main entertainment forms of the Lantern Festival.
sentences.chinese: 踩高蹺，敲大鼓和舞龍獅也是元宵節主要的娛樂活動。

sentences.english: They set off firecrackers and watch fireworks displays.
sentences.chinese: 我們出去看看舞龍獅和放鞭炮。

sentences.english: Besides, the artistic touch can influence the expression of dragon dance rhythms.
sentences.chinese: 此外，藝術素養也會影響舞龍節奏的表達。

sentences.english: The boys are learning a dragon dance.

definition: Tonggu county in Yichun 宜春, Jiangxi
stilts/walking on stilts as component of folk dance
Wanluan township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
to add to the fun/to liven things up
opera highlights performed as independent pieces
Paiwan, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan
